# Path Separator

> POSIX path segment separator.


<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var PATH_SEP_POSIX = require( '@stdlib/utils/path-sep-posix' );
```

#### PATH_SEP_POSIX

POSIX path segment separator.

``` javascript
var sep = PATH_SEP_POSIX;
// returns '/'
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var PATH_SEP_POSIX = require( '@stdlib/utils/path-sep-posix' );

var parts;
var path;

path = 'foo/bar/baz';
parts = path.split( PATH_SEP_POSIX );
// returns ['foo','bar','baz']

path = 'foo\\bar\\baz';
parts = path.split( PATH_SEP_POSIX );
// returns ['foo\\bar\\baz' ]
```

<!-- </examples> -->
